full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` RNAM RTOG GIS BRTAGS PA'I GNOD PA'I RIGS BZLOG PA'I RGYAL BA'I YE SHES RDO RJE ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @021A *, ,('DI LTAR RNAM RTOG GIS BTAGS PA'I GNOD PA'I RIGS BZLOG PA'I RGYAL PO YE SHES @021B RDO RJE ZHES BGYI BA 'DI NI, 'JAM DBYANGS GOD MID RGYAL CHEN PO'I RGYAL SRID KYI BLON PO RIN PO CHE, CHO RIGS NI STOBS KYI 'KHOR LOS BSGYUR NA CHING GIS RIGS LAS BYUNG BA JANG JONG CHEN PO CHIN WANG GI SRAS LNGA PA, ? SRID KYI RIG PA DANG LDAN PA GUNG RGYAL ? RDO RJE AER KHE AA HAS DANG, GOS CIS RIG PA'I BLO GROS RGYAL BA AA CHE THU TAR HAN THO YON CHOS RJE BLO BZANG CHOS 'BYOR ZHES BYA GNYIS KA DANG, NAN TAN CHEN PO'I GSUNG GIS YANG 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES SKUL BA'I NGO KHRAL DU KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS @022A *, ,DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, NYON MONGS KYI BRAN DU 'KHOL NA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS, SA SKYA PAn CHEN GYI LAS TSOGS LA BRTEN NAS BSGRIGS PAR BGYIS PA 'DIR DGE BA YOD NA, DE YIS BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA MDANG, BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS SKYES SU'I SKU TSE'I RGYAL MTSAN BSTAN PA DANG, BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG BSKUL BA PO SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD GNAS SKABS DANG MTHAR THUG GI PHYI NANG GI BGEGS DANG BRAL NAS YAN PA DANG BDE BA RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS, BDE LEGS, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
